# PT ALAMTRI RESOURCES INDONESIA Tbk (dahulu/formerly PT ADARO ENERGY INDONESIA Tbk) DAN ENTITAS ANAKNYA/AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES
## CATATAN ATAS LAPORAN KEUANGAN KONSOLIDASIAN ## NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
31 DESEMBER 2024 DAN 2023 31 DECEMBER 2024 AND 2023  
(Dinyatakan dalam Dolar AS, (Expressed in thousands of US Dollars,  
kecuali dinyatakan lain) unless otherwise stated).  
### UMUM ### GENERAL  
a. Pendirian Perusahaan dan informasi a. Establishment of the Company and other information  
lainnya  
PT Alamtri Resources Indonesia Tbk (dahulu The Company was established by Notaris  
(formerly PT Adaro Energy Indonesia Tbk) Sukawaty Sumadi, S.H., Notary in Jakarta.  
("Perusahaan") didirikan berdasarkan Akta The Deed No. 25 dated 28 July 2004 of Sukawaty  
No. 25, tanggal 28 Juli 2004. Akta Sumadi, S.H., Notary in Jakarta. The Deed was  
pendirian Perusahaan disahkan oleh Menteri published in the State Gazette of the Republic  
Hukum Republik Indonesia No. 59, tanggal of Indonesia No. 59, dated 25 July 2008, State  
25 Juli 2006, Tambahan Berita Negara Gazette Supplement No. 8036 and was  
Republik Indonesia No. 3038. approved by the Minister of Law of the Republic  
Keputusan C-21493 HT.01.01.TH.2004. of Indonesia pursuant to Decree  
tanggal 26 Agustus 2004 (anggaran dasar No. C-21303 HT.01.01.TH.2004, dated  
pertama kali). Perubahan terakhir atas 26 August 2004. The articles of association  
anggaran dasar Perusahaan dengan Akta have been amended several times, with the most  
No. 55 tanggal 18 November 2024 yang recent change by Deed No. 55 dated 18 November  
dibuat di hadapan Hurnbler Llc, S.H., M.Kn., 2024 made before Hurnbler Llc, S.H., M.Kn.,  
Notaris di Jakarta Utara, dengan perubahan Notary in North Jakarta, in connection with the  
nama Perusahaan menjadi PT change of Company’s name to PT Alamtri  
Alamtri Resources Indonesia Tbk. Perubahan Resources Indonesia Tbk. This amendment to  
anggaran dasar ini telah mendapatkan the articles of association was approved by the  
persetujuan dari Menteri Hukum Republik Minister of Law of the Republic of Indonesia  
Indonesia berdasarkan surat No. AHU- pursuant to Decree No. 0248324.AH.01.11.TAHUN  
228352.AH.01.11.TAHUN 2024 tanggal 15 2024 dated 15 November 2024.  
November 2024. Pada bulan Juli 2008, Perusahaan melakukan In July 2008, the Company conducted an IPO  
Penawaran Umum Saham Perdana sebanyak of 111,339,331 shares (34.8% dari total  
31.985.962.000 lembar saham) dan modal saham yang ditempatkan dan disetor issued and fully paid up) and was listed on the Indonesian Stock  
sepenuhnya menjadi 31.985.962.000 lembar Exchange on 10 July 2008.  
saham yang ditempatkan dan disetor penuh  
dan tercatat di Bursa Efek Indonesia pada  
tanggal 16 Juli 2008.  
Sesuai dengan Pasal 3 anggaran dasar In accordance with Article 3 of the Company's  
Perusahaan, Maksud dan Tujuan Perusahaan articles of association, the Purpose and  
adalah menjalankan usaha dalam bidang Objectives of the Company are conducting  
bisnis konsulting dan jasa manajemen management consulting activities (for the  
(untuk kegiatan usaha entitas anak Perusahaan Company's subsidiaries' business activities  
yang bergerak dalam bidang which include mining, quarrying, mining  
pertambangan, penggalian, jasa penunjang support services, hiring, transportation,  
besar, angkutan, pergudangan dan aktivitas port services, cargo handling (stevedoring), sea  
penunjang angkutan, penanganan kargo transportation support services, warehousing  
(contoh: muat barang), aktivitas kepelabuhanan and transportation support activities,  
pelabuhan, pertanian tanaman, konstruksi, agriculture, construction, repair and  
reparasi dan pemasangan mesin, construction of machines, power supply, water  
pengadaan air (listrik, pengolahan air, treatment, forestry and industry).  
kesehatan dan industri).  
Perusahaan mulai beroperasi secara The Company commenced its commercial  
komersial pada bulan Juli 2005. Kantor operations in July 2005. The Company's head  
berdomisili di Jakarta dan berlokasi di Gedung office is in Jakarta and is located at the Menara  
Menara Karya, lantai 23, Jl. H.R. Rasuna Said Karya Building, 23rd Floor, Jl. H.R. Rasuna  
Blok X-5, Kav, 1-2, Jakarta Selatan. Said Block X-5, Kav, 1-2, South Jakarta.

# PT ALAMTRI RESOURCES INDONESIA Tbk (dahulu/formerly PT ADARO ENERGY INDONESIA Tbk)
DAN ENTITAS ANAKNYA/AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES

## CATATAN ATAS LAPORAN KEUANGAN KONSOLIDASI/AS NOTES TO THE CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
31 DESEMBER 2024 DAN 2023/31 DECEMBER 2024 AND 2023
(Dinyatakan dalam ribuan Dolar AS, kecuali dinyatakan lain)/(Expressed in thousands of US Dollars, unless otherwise stated)

### 1. UMUM (lanjut)/1. GENERAL (continued)

#### a. Pendirian Perusahaan dan informasi lainnya (lanjutan)/a. Establishment of the Company and other information (continued)

PT Adaro Strategic Investments ("ASI") merupakan Pengendali dan Perusahaan Saham lain-lain sebagaimana dimaksud dalam Pasal 1 angka 4 Peraturan OJK No. 9/POJK.04/2018 tentang Pedoman serta Akta Pernyataan Keputusan RUPSLB tanggal 28 Juni 2024, sebagai ASI dan Bapak Garibaldi Thohir ("Garibaldi Thohir"), selaku pemegang 52,089% saham pada Perusahaan./PT Adaro Strategic Investments ("ASI") together with Garibaldi Thohir collectively own number 1 letter a of the OJK Regulation No. 9/POJK.04/2018 company’s, as acquisition of a Publicly Traded Companies, as ASI and Garibaldi Thohir collectively own 52.089% of shares in the Company's.

Furthermore, the Company's Beneficial Owners are Garibaldi Thohir, Christian Ariano Rachmat, Cristoforo Hernawan, and Michael W.P. Soeryadjaya, secara efektif acting in concert atau sebagai anggota grup dalam kapasitasnya sebagai anggota Direksi dan Komisaris dari ASI/individually and as a member of the Company's Boards of Commissioners and Directors.

Pada tanggal 31 Desember 2024, Perusahaan dan entitas anaknya ("Grup") memiliki 10.356 karyawan tetap dan 13.983 karyawan kontrak (tidak diaudit) (2023: 13.983 karyawan tidak diaudit).  
As at 31 December 2024, the Company and its subsidiaries ("Group") had 10,356 permanent employees (unaudited) and 13,983 non-permanent employees (unaudited) (2023: 13,983 non-permanent employees (unaudited)).

Pada tahun 2024 dan 2023, nilai dan jumlah lembar saham yang diakuisisi oleh Group tidak signifikan
In 2024 and 2023, the value and number of shares acquired by the Group were insignificant.
Pada 30 Juni 2022 dan 30 Juni 2021, Direksi PT Alamtri Resources Indonesia Tbk memutuskan pembentukan dan pemanfaatan anak perusahaan yang akan melakukan kegiatan usaha jasa pertambangan.
On 30 June 2022 and 30 June 2021, the Directors of PT Alamtri Resources Indonesia Tbk decided to establish and utilise subsidiaries which will conduct mining services business.
Pada tanggal 15 Juli 2024, PT Alamtri Anakresources akan menjadi Entitas Anak
On 15 July 2024, PT Alamtri Anakresources will become a subsidiary .

404 Annual Report 2024 PT Alamtri Resources Indonesia Tbk
